content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I received a command to browse the website https://www.spanish.academy/blog/11-best-free-spanish-language-learning-websites/ to find resources for practicing writing in Spanish. The command asked for information on available resources for writing in Spanish.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The text does not provide information about resources available for practicing writing in Spanish. It provides a list of 11 free Spanish language learning websites that offer resources for listening, speaking, grammar, and vocabulary exercises. The article is written by Michelle Margaret Fajkus, a bilingual elementary school teacher and expat living in Guatemala, who shares her experience and recommendations for Spanish language learning websites and posts about Latin American culture and language learning. \n \n Links: [' (https://www.spanish.academy/)', 'Programs (https://www.spanish.academy/programs/)', 'Preschool (https://www.spanish.academy/programs/preschool/)', 'Elementary School (https://www.spanish.academy/programs/elementaryschool/)', 'Middle School (https://www.spanish.academy/programs/middleschool/)']"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "best resources for practicing writing in spanish"}}}'}]
"""
